actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch and Child Nutrition Act in order to extend existing provisions of law under which income guidelines are established for reduced price lunches.

summary.text: Reduced Price Lunch Amendments - Extends, under the National School Lunch and Child Nutrition Act, the existing provisions of law under which income guidelines are established for reduced price lunches.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch and Child Nutrition Act in order to extend existing provisions of law under which income guidelines are established for reduced price lunches.
